properties.name: workspaceId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: A user-defined way to group activities of the same nature. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A description of the activity; displayed in the timeline

properties.name: key
properties.description: Supply a key that must be unique or leave blank to have one generated

properties.name: link
properties.description: A URL for the activity; displayed in the timeline

properties.name: linkText
properties.description: The text for the timeline link

properties.name: occurredAt
properties.description: The date and time the activity occurred; defaults to now

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: filters
properties.description: When set the post will be filtered by the member ID

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create an activity for a member

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many activities

properties.name: resolveIdentities
properties.description: By default, the response just includes the reference of the identity. When set to true the identities will be resolved automatically.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Name of the field the response will be sorted by

properties.name: id
properties.description: The username at the source

properties.name: username
properties.description: The username at the source

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email address

properties.name: host
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: tagsToAdd
properties.description: Adds tags to member; comma-separated string or array

properties.name: tagList
properties.description: Replaces all tags for the member; comma-separated string or array

properties.name: identityUi
properties.description: The identity is used to find the member. If no member exists, a new member will be created and linked to the provided identity.

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete a member

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get a member

properties.name: Lookup
properties.description: Lookup a member by identity

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a member

properties.name: note
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: resolveMember
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: deprecated
properties.displayName: Orbit has been shutdown and will no longer function from July 11th, You can read more here.
